name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Automation Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing efficient automation solutions using **n8n**, **REST APIs**, and **webhooks** to streamline processes. I am proficient in integrating various tools such as **HubSpot**, **Airtable**, **Slack**, **Notion**, **Stripe**, and **Google Workspace** for enhanced productivity and seamless data flow. My solid foundation in **JavaScript** and **SQL** allows me to build data pipelines and execute ETL processes effectively. Additionally, I possess strong problem-solving and communication skills, ensuring clear collaboration across teams.

I have a proven track record in building high-performance solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging technologies like **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My cloud expertise encompasses **Azure** and **AWS**, where I have developed enterprise-grade platforms incorporating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing. I am also experienced in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring robust and compliant applications aligned with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Furthermore, I have hands-on expertise in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows, utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
